js.content:
$ = (id) -> document.getElementById id

[log, target, style] = ['log', 'target', 'target-stylist'].map $

getStyle = ->
    wt = log.firstElementChild
    getComputedStyle(target).WebkitTransform.replace /\W([\d.-]+)/g, (m, r1) ->
        wt.textContent = (+r1 * 10000 |0) / 10000
        wt = wt.nextElementSibling

style.addEventListener 'keyup', getStyle, false
getStyle()
